title: Leaverbuster
body:
Wow, the new Leaverbuster is harsh, not that I'm complaining, it's actually about time something was done about the constant afks on this server, just a shame that so many people had to have so many ranked games ruined before Riot decided it was something worth looking in to.

Now where's the punishment for the toxic players?

replies.body:
> Now where's the punishment for the toxic players?

Being worked on right now. Literally right now. Go check Riots announcement about the tribunal from earlier this year.
They have been saying that for a long time now.
No, they've been saying they're working on an OCE skin for a long time now...
They say they have been doing a lot, but generally results come from doing things.
